create or replace TABLE SNAPOSEITG_INTEGRATION.ITG_SPIRAL_MTI_OFFTAKE (
	STT VARCHAR(100),
	AREA VARCHAR(100),
	CHANNELNAME VARCHAR(100),
	CUSTOMERNAME VARCHAR(100),
	SHOPCODE VARCHAR(100),
	SHOPNAME VARCHAR(100),
	ADDRESS VARCHAR(100),
	SUPCODE VARCHAR(100),
	SUPNAME VARCHAR(100),
	YEAR VARCHAR(100),
	MONTH VARCHAR(100),
	BARCODE VARCHAR(100),
	PRODUCTNAME VARCHAR(100),
	FRANCHISE VARCHAR(100),
	BRAND VARCHAR(100),
	CATE VARCHAR(100),
	SUB_CAT VARCHAR(100),
	SUB_BRAND VARCHAR(100),
	SIZE VARCHAR(100),
	QUANTITY VARCHAR(100),
	AMOUNT VARCHAR(100),
	AMOUNTUSD VARCHAR(100),
	FILE_NAME VARCHAR(100),
	CRTD_NAME TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9),
	UPDT_DTTM TIMESTAMP_NTZ(9)
);

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_VN_SELLOUT_INVENTORY_FACT (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_vn_sellout_inventory_fact (
    cntry_cd varchar(2),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cntry_nm varchar(7),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    warehse_cd varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    dstrbtr_grp_cd varchar(30),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    dstrbtr_soldto_code varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    dstrbtr_matl_num varchar(50),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sap_matl_num varchar(40),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    bar_cd varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    inv_dt date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    soh numeric(14,2),		--//  ENCODE raw
    soh_val numeric(15,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    jj_soh_val numeric(15,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    beg_stock_qty numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    end_stock_qty numeric(14,2),		--//  ENCODE raw
    beg_stock_val numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    end_stock_val numeric(15,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    jj_beg_stock_qty numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    jj_end_stock_qty numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    jj_beg_stock_val numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    jj_end_stock_val numeric(18,0)		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_VN_MT_SELLIN_TARGET (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_vn_mt_sellin_target (
    cust_code varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    data_type varchar(4),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying

    sellin_cycle numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer

)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.EDW_VW_VN_MT_SELLIN_SELLOUT_ANALYSIS (		--// CREATE TABLE SNAPOSEEDW_INTEGRATION.edw_vw_vn_mt_sellin_sellout_analysis (
    data_source varchar(6),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    data_type varchar(7),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    invoice_date varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    year numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    qrtr_no numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    qrtr varchar(14),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mnth_id varchar(23),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mnth_desc varchar(15),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mnth_no numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    mnth_shrt varchar(3),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    mnth_long varchar(9),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    wk numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    mnth_wk_no numeric(38,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // bigint
    cal_year numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    cal_qrtr_no numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    cal_mnth_id numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    cal_mnth_no numeric(18,0),		--//  ENCODE raw // integer
    cal_mnth_nm varchar(9),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    cal_date date,		--//  ENCODE raw
    cal_date_id varchar(52),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    supplier_code varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    supplier_name varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    plant varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    productid varchar(100),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    product_name varchar(1125),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    barcode varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    jnj_sap_code varchar(40),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    franchise varchar(1687),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    category varchar(1687),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sub_category varchar(1350),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sub_brand varchar(1687),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    size varchar(400),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    channel varchar(10),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    custcode varchar(200),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    name varchar(500),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    address varchar(300),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sub_channel varchar(1125),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    group_account varchar(1125),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    account varchar(1125),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    region varchar(1125),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    province varchar(1125),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    retail_environment varchar(450),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    district varchar,		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    zone varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    period varchar(20),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_supervisor varchar(450),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    kam varchar(450),		--//  ENCODE raw // character varying
    sales_qty numeric(38,4),		--//  ENCODE raw
    sales_amt_lcy numeric(38,9),		--//  ENCODE raw
    sales_amt_usd numeric(38,14),		--//  ENCODE raw
    target_lcy numeric(28,10),		--//  ENCODE raw
    target_usd numeric(28,10)		--//  ENCODE raw
)
;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;

;		--// DISTSTYLE EVEN;
